customer_addr:
330 RED LANE
BIRD IN HAND, PA 17505

citations.narrative:
A current record of guinea pigs on hand was not available at time of this inspection. A total of 858 guinea pigs were
counted during the inspection. There were no inventory records kept for several months indicating the number of adult
guinea pigs, weanlings, and newborns held, raised, or born. Failure to maintain these records can make it difficult to
assess the health of the caviary by identifying losses by decreased number of guinea pigs born or raised. The licensee
must keep and maintain records containing the required information which discloses the number of guinea pigs held,
owned, acquired or disposed of including births. Remains uncorrected.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End Section

narrative:
2.75(b)(1)  Repeat
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
A current record of guinea pigs on hand was not available at time of this inspection. A total of 858 guinea pigs were 
counted during the inspection. There were no inventory records kept for several months indicating the number of adult 
guinea pigs, weanlings, and newborns held, raised, or born. Failure to maintain these records can make it difficult to 
assess the health of the caviary by identifying losses by decreased number of guinea pigs born or raised. The licensee 
must keep and maintain records containing the required information which discloses the number of guinea pigs held, 
owned, acquired or disposed of including births. Remains uncorrected. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End Section
